exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) r : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM r p : list (Term A n) Hcan : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r p Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM r" with "False".

original: intros Q r H. right. unfold irreducible. intros p Hcan. exists r. split. auto. apply H.
